roleset.name: specialize
roleset.note: SPECIALIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'specialize' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. (from specialize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: they all look like this
example.text: The company's chairman, Mr. Laidig, and a group of advisers met at the offices of Wachtel Lipton Rosen& Katz, a law firm specializing in takeover defense.

roleset.name: unique
roleset.note: SPECIAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1. (from special.01-j)

role.descr: thing that is unique, possibly cherished
entity cherishing, holding arg1 as unique

example.name: that special kind of special
example.text: Our best friend 's sister 's wedding was uhm , special .

example.name: both args
example.text: Now you know why-1 July is special to me [*-1].
